00033 
00034  SUBROUTINE PostStream
00035 
00036 !  Common Variables
00037  USE Domain
00038  USE FluidParams, ONLY : phi
00039  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f, g
00040  USE MPIParams
00041  USE MPI
00042  IMPLICIT NONE
00043 
00044 !  Local Variables
00045  INTEGER :: count, i, j, k
00046  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ1, MPI_REQ2, MPI_REQ3, MPI_REQ4
00047  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00048 
00049 !----------Exchange inward pointing f values -----------------------------------
00050 ! X direction
00051  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_east_rcv, xsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00052  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_west_rcv, xsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00053  count = 1
00054  DO k = zl, zu
00055    DO j = yl, yu
00056      f_west_snd(count) = f(xlg,j,k,2,nxt)
00057      f_east_snd(count) = f(xug,j,k,1,nxt)
00058      count = count + 1
00059    END DO
00060  END DO
00061  CALL MPI_SEND(f_west_snd, xsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00062  CALL MPI_SEND(f_east_snd, xsize , MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00063  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00064  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00065 
00066 ! Y direction
00067  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_north_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00068  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_south_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00069  count = 1
00070  DO k = zl, zu
00071    DO i = xl, xu
00072      f_south_snd(count) = f(i,ylg,k,4,nxt)
00073      f_north_snd(count) = f(i,yug,k,3,nxt)
00074      count = count + 1
00075    END DO
00076  END DO
00077  CALL MPI_SEND(f_south_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00078  CALL MPI_SEND(f_north_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00079  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00080  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00081 
00082 ! Z direction
00083  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_top_rcv, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00084  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_bot_rcv, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00085  count = 1
00086  DO j = yl, yu
00087    DO i = xl, xu
00088      f_bot_snd(count) = f(i,j,zlg,6,nxt)
00089      f_top_snd(count)    = f(i,j,zug,5,nxt)
00090      count = count + 1
00091    END DO
00092  END DO
00093  CALL MPI_SEND(f_bot_snd, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00094  CALL MPI_SEND(f_top_snd, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00095  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00096  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00097 
00098 
00099 !-------- Update inward values of f and g in real nodes ------------------------
00100 ! X direction
00101  count = 1
00102  DO k = zl, zu
00103    DO j = yl, yu
00104      f(xu,j,k, 2,nxt) = f_east_rcv(count)
00105      g(xu,j,k, 2,nxt) = g_east_rcv(count)
00106      g(xu,j,k, 8,nxt) = g_east_rcv(count + xsize)
00107      g(xu,j,k,10,nxt) = g_east_rcv(count + xsize2)
00108      g(xu,j,k,12,nxt) = g_east_rcv(count + xsize3)
00109      g(xu,j,k,14,nxt) = g_east_rcv(count + xsize4)
00110 
00111      f(xl,j,k, 1,nxt)  = f_west_rcv(count)
00112      g(xl,j,k, 1,nxt)  = g_west_rcv(count)
00113      g(xl,j,k, 7,nxt)  = g_west_rcv(count + xsize)
00114      g(xl,j,k, 9,nxt)  = g_west_rcv(count + xsize2)
00115      g(xl,j,k,11,nxt)  = g_west_rcv(count + xsize3)
00116      g(xl,j,k,13,nxt)  = g_west_rcv(count + xsize4)
00117      count = count + 1
00118    END DO
00119  END DO
00120 
00121 ! Y direction
00122  count = 1
00123  DO k = zl, zu
00124    DO i = xl, xu
00125      f(i,yu,k, 4,nxt) = f_north_rcv(count)
00126      g(i,yu,k, 4,nxt) = g_north_rcv(count)
00127      g(i,yu,k, 8,nxt) = g_north_rcv(count + ysize)
00128      g(i,yu,k, 9,nxt) = g_north_rcv(count + ysize2)
00129      g(i,yu,k,16,nxt) = g_north_rcv(count + ysize3)
00130      g(i,yu,k,18,nxt) = g_north_rcv(count + ysize4)
00131 
00132      f(i,yl,k, 3,nxt)  = f_south_rcv(count)
00133      g(i,yl,k, 3,nxt)  = g_south_rcv(count)
00134      g(i,yl,k, 7,nxt)  = g_south_rcv(count + ysize)
00135      g(i,yl,k,10,nxt)  = g_south_rcv(count + ysize2)
00136      g(i,yl,k,15,nxt)  = g_south_rcv(count + ysize3)
00137      g(i,yl,k,17,nxt)  = g_south_rcv(count + ysize4)
00138      count = count + 1
00139    END DO
00140  END DO
00141 
00142 ! Z direction
00143  count = 1
00144  DO j = yl, yu
00145    DO i = xl, xu
00146      f(i,j,zu, 6,nxt) = f_top_rcv(count)
00147      g(i,j,zu, 6,nxt) = g_top_rcv(count)
00148      g(i,j,zu,12,nxt) = g_top_rcv(count + zsize)
00149      g(i,j,zu,13,nxt) = g_top_rcv(count + zsize2)
00150      g(i,j,zu,16,nxt) = g_top_rcv(count + zsize3)
00151      g(i,j,zu,17,nxt) = g_top_rcv(count + zsize4)
00152 
00153      f(i,j,zl, 5,nxt)  = f_bot_rcv(count)
00154      g(i,j,zl, 5,nxt)  = g_bot_rcv(count)
00155      g(i,j,zl,11,nxt)  = g_bot_rcv(count + zsize)
00156      g(i,j,zl,14,nxt)  = g_bot_rcv(count + zsize2)
00157      g(i,j,zl,15,nxt)  = g_bot_rcv(count + zsize3)
00158      g(i,j,zl,18,nxt)  = g_bot_rcv(count + zsize4)
00159      count = count + 1
00160    END DO
00161  END DO
00162 
00163 !  Edges along x
00164  count = 1
00165  DO i = xl, xu
00166    g(i,yu,zu,16,nxt) = g_tn_rcv(count)
00167    g(i,yl,zu,17,nxt) = g_ts_rcv(count)
00168    g(i,yl,zl,15,nxt) = g_bs_rcv(count)
00169    g(i,yu,zl,18,nxt) = g_bn_rcv(count)
00170    count = count + 1
00171  END DO
00172 
00173 !  Edges along y
00174  count = 1
00175  DO j = yl, yu
00176    g(xu,j,zu,12,nxt) = g_te_rcv(count)
00177    g(xl,j,zu,13,nxt) = g_tw_rcv(count)
00178    g(xl,j,zl,11,nxt) = g_bw_rcv(count)
00179    g(xu,j,zl,14,nxt) = g_be_rcv(count)
00180    count = count + 1
00181  END DO
00182 
00183 !  Edges along z
00184  count = 1
00185  DO k = zl, zu
00186    g(xu,yu,k, 8,nxt) = g_ne_rcv(count)
00187    g(xl,yu,k, 9,nxt) = g_nw_rcv(count)
00188    g(xl,yl,k, 7,nxt) = g_sw_rcv(count)
00189    g(xu,yl,k,10,nxt) = g_se_rcv(count)
00190    count = count + 1
00191  END DO
00192 
00193 !-------- Update order parameter for all ghost nodes ---------------------------
00194 ! X direction
00195  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_east_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00196  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_west_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00197  count = 1
00198  DO k = zl, zu
00199    DO j = yl, yu
00200      phi_west_snd(count) = SUM(f(xl,j,k,:,nxt))
00201      phi_east_snd(count) = SUM(f(xu,j,k,:,nxt))
00202      count = count + 1
00203    END DO
00204  END DO
00205  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_west_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00206  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_east_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00207  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00208  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00209 
00210 ! Y direction
00211  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_north_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00212  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_south_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00213  count = 1
00214  DO k = zl, zu
00215    DO i = xl, xu
00216      phi_south_snd(count) = SUM(f(i,yl,k,:,nxt))
00217      phi_north_snd(count) = SUM(f(i,yu,k,:,nxt))
00218      count = count + 1
00219    END DO
00220  END DO
00221  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_south_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00222  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_north_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00223  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00224  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00225 
00226 ! Z direction
00227  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_top_rcv, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00228  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_bot_rcv, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00229  count = 1
00230  DO j = yl, yu
00231    DO i = xl, xu
00232      phi_bot_snd(count) = SUM(f(i,j,zl,:,nxt))
00233      phi_top_snd(count)    = SUM(f(i,j,zu,:,nxt))
00234      count = count + 1
00235    END DO
00236  END DO
00237  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_bot_snd, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00238  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_top_snd, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00239  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00240  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00241 
00242 ! Edges along x
00243  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_tn_rcv, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, tn, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00244  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_bs_rcv, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bs, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00245  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_bn_rcv, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bn, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ3, MPI_ERR)
00246  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_ts_rcv, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ts, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ4, MPI_ERR)
00247  count = 1
00248  DO i = xl, xu
00249    phi_tn_snd(count) = SUM(f(i,yu,zu,:,nxt))
00250    phi_ts_snd(count) = SUM(f(i,yl,zu,:,nxt))
00251    phi_bs_snd(count) = SUM(f(i,yl,zl,:,nxt))
00252    phi_bn_snd(count) = SUM(f(i,yu,zl,:,nxt))
00253    count = count + 1
00254  END DO
00255  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_bs_snd, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bs, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00256  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_tn_snd, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, tn, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00257  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_ts_snd, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ts, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00258  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_bn_snd, xedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bn, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00259  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00260  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00261  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ3, status, MPI_ERR)
00262  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ4, status, MPI_ERR)
00263  
00264 ! Edges along y
00265  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_te_rcv, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, te, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00266  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_bw_rcv, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00267  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_be_rcv, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, be, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ3, MPI_ERR)
00268  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_tw_rcv, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, tw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ4, MPI_ERR)
00269  count = 1
00270  DO j = yl, yu
00271    phi_te_snd(count) = SUM(f(xu,j,zu,:,nxt))
00272    phi_tw_snd(count) = SUM(f(xl,j,zu,:,nxt))
00273    phi_bw_snd(count) = SUM(f(xl,j,zl,:,nxt))
00274    phi_be_snd(count) = SUM(f(xu,j,zl,:,nxt))
00275    count = count + 1
00276  END DO
00277  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_bw_snd, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00278  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_te_snd, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, te, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00279  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_tw_snd, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, tw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00280  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_be_snd, yedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, be, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00281  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00282  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00283  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ3, status, MPI_ERR)
00284  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ4, status, MPI_ERR)
00285  
00286 ! Edges along z
00287  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_ne_rcv, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00288  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_sw_rcv, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00289  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_se_rcv, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ3, MPI_ERR)
00290  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_nw_rcv, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ4, MPI_ERR)
00291  count = 1
00292  DO k = zl, zu
00293    phi_ne_snd(count) = SUM(f(xu,yu,k,:,nxt))
00294    phi_nw_snd(count) = SUM(f(xl,yu,k,:,nxt))
00295    phi_sw_snd(count) = SUM(f(xl,yl,k,:,nxt))
00296    phi_se_snd(count) = SUM(f(xu,yl,k,:,nxt))
00297    count = count + 1
00298  END DO
00299  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_sw_snd, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00300  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_ne_snd, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00301  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_nw_snd, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00302  CALL MPI_SEND(phi_se_snd, zedge, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00303  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00304  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00305  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ3, status, MPI_ERR)
00306  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ4, status, MPI_ERR)
00307 
00308 !-------- Update order parameter values ----------------------------------------
00309 ! X direction
00310  count = 1
00311  DO k = zl, zu
00312    DO j = yl, yu
00313      phi(xug,j,k) = phi_east_rcv(count)
00314      phi(xlg,j,k) = phi_west_rcv(count)
00315      count = count + 1
00316    END DO
00317  END DO
00318 
00319 ! Y direction
00320  count = 1
00321  DO k = zl, zu
00322    DO i = xl, xu
00323      phi(i,yug,k) = phi_north_rcv(count)
00324      phi(i,ylg,k) = phi_south_rcv(count)
00325      count = count + 1
00326    END DO
00327  END DO
00328 
00329 ! Z direction
00330  count = 1
00331  DO j = yl, yu
00332    DO i = xl, xu
00333      phi(i,j,zug) = phi_top_rcv(count)
00334      phi(i,j,zlg) = phi_bot_rcv(count)
00335      count = count + 1
00336    END DO
00337  END DO
00338 
00339 ! Edges along x
00340  count = 1
00341  DO i = xl, xu
00342    phi(i,yug,zug) = phi_tn_rcv(count)
00343    phi(i,ylg,zug) = phi_ts_rcv(count)
00344    phi(i,ylg,zlg) = phi_bs_rcv(count)
00345    phi(i,yug,zlg) = phi_bn_rcv(count)
00346    count = count + 1
00347  END DO
00348 
00349 ! Edges along y
00350  count = 1
00351  DO j = yl, yu
00352    phi(xug,j,zug) = phi_te_rcv(count)
00353    phi(xlg,j,zug) = phi_tw_rcv(count)
00354    phi(xlg,j,zlg) = phi_bw_rcv(count)
00355    phi(xug,j,zlg) = phi_be_rcv(count)
00356    count = count + 1
00357  END DO
00358 
00359 ! Edges along z
00360  count = 1
00361  DO k = zl, zu
00362    phi(xug,yug,k) = phi_ne_rcv(count)
00363    phi(xlg,yug,k) = phi_nw_rcv(count)
00364    phi(xlg,ylg,k) = phi_sw_rcv(count)
00365    phi(xug,ylg,k) = phi_se_rcv(count)
00366    count = count + 1
00367  END DO
00368 
00369  RETURN
00370  END SUBROUTINE PostStream
